sense.gloss: latter part (of book, etc.), sequel, concluding part
compilation (esp. dictionary, history, law code), editing
original story (as opposed to a sequel, spin-off, etc.), main story, main part(s) of a story
the movie (as opposed to the trailers; at a movie theater), feature film (main item in a cinema program)
movie based on a TV series, movie version of a TV series
book containing a collection of poems
second part (of three), second volume, middle part
novelette, novella, short novel, long short story, medium-length story
x: 中編小説・ちゅうへんしょうせつ
